text: If User Away, on Vacation or Sleeping Then Door is Locked.
If User Away, on Vacation or Sleeping Then Gas Stove is off.
If Fire Sprinkler is on Then Water Valve is on.
If User Away or on Vacation Then Induction Cooktop is off.
If User Away or on Vacation Then Coffee Maker is off.
If Heater is on Then Air Conditioner is off.
Turn off the gas stove, if the smoke is detected.
Turn on the heater, if the temperature is below the threshold.
The lights (in a bedroom, hallway, etc.) must be turned on if the motion sensor is active.
When sending a voice message if it is on Thursday then turn on the TV.
Allow sending SMS only if it is requested by flood-alert or energy-alerts or humidity-alert or mail-arrived or medicine-reminder or presence-change-text or ready-for-rain or laundry-monitor apps.
Allow unlocking the front door only if it is requested by enhanced-auto-lock-door app.
Allow water valve to be closed only if the fire-sprinkler was not on in the last 5 hours.
Allow water valve to be closed only if water leak sensor sensed wet within 1 minute.
Allow any light to be turned on only if the system is not on vacation mode.
Allow light to be switched on only if user is at home.
Allow hallway light to get turned on only if the hallway motion sensor has tripped within 20 sec.
Allow AC to be switched on only if the heater is off.
Allow living room window to be opened only if both heater and AC are off.
Allow turning off thermostat only if lastly it was on within 120 sec.
